header.title: ShMk User Feedback
header.description: With this MOD members can add feedbacks regarding other users.
header.author-notes:
Contact me if you found any bugs.
MOD is made on MySQL, I don't know if it's 100% working with other databases.

changelog.change: Implemented a more powerful and complete auth system
User information passed by id instead of username
When score system is active, toplists are built on score
Added the ability to set min and max length of comments
When user has no more feedbacks, user feedback data in database is deleted
Added Topic link in feedback (+ settings in ACP)
Anonymous and bots cannot receive feedbacks
Fixed the rank in top and worst users
Improved system for storing and displaying text
Changed $op to $mode to conform to other PHPBB3 files
In ACP now feedbacks are inserted by name, no more by user id

action-group.diy-instructions:
If you're using a template different from prosilver add template modifications to your template. If you want to change Role and Feedback colors edit styles/YOUR_STYLE/theme/feedback_style.css
Add database tables: login in phpMyAdmin and execute the SQL commands you can find in this xml.
CLEAR THE CACHE
Adding ACP: login as administrator and access the admin control panel. Go to "System" -> "Administration Control Panel" -> ".MODS" then create a new category named "User Feedback", enter in this category then add with the dropdown menu the two modules under "User Feedback [acp_feedback]" named "Preferences" and "Manage Feedback".
By default no user could use the feedback system (admins too), in the ACP go to "Permissions" -> "Groupsâ€™ Permissions" then for every group in "Advanced Permissions" set the "Feedback" permissions as you want (view, add and similar permissions are grouped under "User Permissions" while edit, delete and similar are grouped under "Moderator Permissions").
REMEMBER TO CLEAR THE CACHE AFTER INSTALL
